attributes.action: To immediately bestow a Knighthood on Captain Tom Moore for Services to Charity
attributes.additional_details: To either confirm a Knighthood via the PM or via Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II
attributes.background:
To petition Parliament to ‘immediately’ bestow a Knighthood on Captain Tom Moore for Services to Charity for his amazing fund raising efforts for the NHS. 
Would be amazing to do this on his 100th Birthday, 30th April 2020.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
